ratings.comment: One of the best professors I have ever had. Genuinely cares about each of his students and helps them succeed.

Professor Phillips is the best prof I have ever had. He is not bias about politics and gives the facts straight. He genuinely cares about his students and I have gone to ask him about career guidance as well. He has a true passion for people with disabilities and it shows through in his lectures.

Brian Phillips is one of the best professors I've had. He is a genuinely nice person and truly cares how his students do. He makes the 3 hour lecture tolerable and is always interested in hearing back from his students on how he's doing. He made me realize what I want to do in the future, and I sincerely wish I could have him as a professor again.

Brian is a great professor. He is so passionate about the material, but also about his students. Even if the content isn't that great he is very aware of it and tries to lighten it up (even during the 3 hour lectures). It is really clear that he wants every one of his students to do well and very clear that he is a great person.

Brian Phillips is my absolute favorite professor.  He is kind and caring, very involved in his field, and is truly an amazing teacher.  Even in large lectures, he takes the time to learn everyone's names.  It is clear every single class period that he desires for his students to succeed.

Brian Phillips changed my life.  He is truly one of the most caring, compassionate professorshuman beings I've ever had the pleasure of knowing, if only for even just a semester.  He cares about his students and truly wants everyone to succeed.  He inspires me to be a better person and a better professional.
Such a great professor. I really enjoyed his teaching methods. The classes are very easy but still enjoyable. The material is not very hard but your outlook of the world is drastically changed.
Brian Phillips' sincerity and passion make him easy to listen to.  He is adorably funny in his own geeky way.

Did a great job at making the book material interesting and presented it in a comprehensive way. Was extremely fair with exams, was more than willing to throw a question out if the majority of students seemed to struggle with it. Overall, amazing professor! One of the best I have had.
